items.title: Stocks fall after Trump's DOJ opens criminal probe into Powell
items.description: Powell rebuked the probe as an effort to undermine the Fed's independence.

items.title: Ex-husband charged with aggravated murder in slaying of Ohio couple due in court
items.description: A man is due in court on Monday for allegedly gunning down his ex-wife and her husband in their Ohio home over the holidays, authorities said.

items.title: WATCH:  Guide dog and vision-impaired owner are on a travel mission
items.description: ABC News' Danny New reports on two best pals who are turning heads at National Parks across the country -- one on two legs.

items.title: Pope Leo XIV meets with Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado
items.description: Pope Leo XIV has met with Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado at the Vatican

items.title: WATCH:  Wildfires rage in Australia
items.description: Nearly 900,000 acres have burned in the past days as the country bakes in a record-setting heatwave.
